name.baseName: East China Rice-Winter Wheat Production | Agricultural Inputs Production
华东水稻-冬小麦生产 | 农资生产

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1 ton of rice and 1 ton of winter wheat

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The starting boundary of the life cycle of agricultural products is the extraction of energy raw materials related to the life cycle of rice and wheat. The terminal boundary is the output of agricultural crop products and the emission of waste gases after the planting and cultivation of crops.
农产品生命周期的起始边界为与稻麦生命周期相关的能源原料开采, 终止边界为经过农作物种植栽培至收获输出农作物产品和排放废气

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The research data mainly come from the sampling survey results of the input-output of 82 households in Jiangning District, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province over the past two years. The fertilizers mainly include compound fertilizers and urea, insecticides include imidacloprid and chlorpyrifos, and herbicides include butachlor and haloxyfop, etc. All straw in the field is mechanically crushed and returned to the field.
江苏省南京市江宁区82户农户近2年的投入产出抽样调查结果。化肥主要包括复合肥和尿素, 杀虫剂为氧化乐果和辛硫磷, 除草剂为丁草胺和华星草克等。田间秸秆全部采用机械粉碎还田
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the entire lifecycle of the product system, all input and output processes, as well as computational processes, generally include categorization and characterization, normalization, and weighted assessment
对产品系统整个生命周期所有输入与输出的过程及进行运算的过程, 一般包括分类和特征化、标准化和加权评估

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 胡乃娟,陈倩,朱利群.长江中下游稻-麦轮作系统生命周期环境影响评价——以江苏南京为例[J].长江流域资源与环境,2019,28(05):1111-1120.
胡乃娟,陈倩,朱利群.长江中下游稻-麦轮作系统生命周期环境影响评价——以江苏南京为例[J].长江流域资源与环境,2019,28(05):1111-1120.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The results of a two-year input-output sampling survey of 82 households in Jiangning District, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province.
江苏省南京市江宁区82户农户近2年的投入产出抽样调查结果

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.; Documentation: The review of the documentation was performed by Ecobilan and is in compliance with ISO 14040 and 14044. The data set documentation is correct in view of the appropriateness of the information provided. It includes all relevant information in view of data quality and scope of application of the respective LCI result.
